It's an article from a professional reporter in the gaming industry talking about how gaming is just another thing to enjoy, not meant to take up 100% of your lives.
Maybe it could bring comfort to those who feel uncomfortable about gaming as a hobby, maybe it could just make you uncomfortable, idk.
It's worth reading if you've the time, it's not that long c:
